duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide engineering support to customers for electrification projects, and implement electrification solutions based on the company portfolio of products.
Be the voice of the customer for product development roadmap and project liaison between Engineering and customer(s).
Coordinate to evaluate and resolve engineering-related customer issues, manage customer-related engineering deviations and database.
Support product documentation for the customer and contribute to elaborate, evaluate, and review customer application requirements.
Interpret installation drawings and facilitate correction of errors on drawings and documents identified during customer review.
Investigate reports of defective, damaged, or malfunctioning products, determine corrective action plan, and coordinates implementation of plan.
Maintain records to ensure engineering drawings and documents are current and resolutions are documented.
Elaborate and present technical communication, including professional presentations to customers.
Coordinate the company's product testing & launch support activities at customer site and observe/report difficulties or issues.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor of Science in Mechanical/Electrical/Mechatronic Engineering from accredited university
